alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 06 at 4:00AM AKST until February 06 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...SNOW SUNDAY NIGHT... A strong front is moving through the panhandle early this Monday morning. Rain and snow is being reported around southeast Alaska. With colder, drier air moving in behind the front, rain and snow showers are expected through the day. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AKST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Additional snow expected. Most of any significant accumulations will be in the higher elevations of the Klondike Highway where an additional 2 to 4 inches are possible. Another 1 to 2 inches are possible for the Haines Highway, Haines and Skagway through late morning. * WHERE...Municipality of Skagway, Haines Borough and Klukwan. * WHEN...Until 9 AM AKST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest snow rates expected Sunday night.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.

area.areaDesc: Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway
